statements: UPDATE nanotechnology_research_publications SET author='John Doe', title='Nanoparticles in Medicine' WHERE publication_id=1;
UPDATE nanotechnology_research_publications SET published_date='2022-03-15', abstract='This paper discusses the latest advancements in nanotechnology' WHERE publication_id=2;
UPDATE nanotechnology_research_publications SET title = 'Advancements in Nanotechnology', published_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE nanotechnology_research_publications SET abstract = 'New discoveries in nanotech', author = 'Dr. Smith' WHERE publication_id = 2;
UPDATE metadata_table SET publication_title='New Title', publication_date='2021-09-15' WHERE publication_id=1;
UPDATE documentation_table SET document_content='Updated content' WHERE document_id=3;

UPDATE metadata_table SET publication_title = 'Updated Title', publication_date = '2021-08-20', authors = ARRAY['Author A', 'Author B'], keywords = ARRAY['Keyword X', 'Keyword Y'], abstract = 'Updated Abstract' WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE documentation_table SET document_content = 'Updated content', created_at = '2021-08-21 10:00:00' WHERE document_id = 1;
UPDATE publications_metadata SET title = 'New Title', authors = ARRAY['Author1', 'Author2'] WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE publications_metadata SET publication_date = '2022-03-10', abstract = 'New Abstract' WHERE publication_id = 2;
UPDATE publications_metadata SET title = 'New Title', publication_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE publication_id = 1001;
UPDATE publication_authors SET author_name = 'Jane Doe' WHERE author_id = 101;
UPDATE nanotech_publications SET publication_author = 'John Doe', publication_year = 2020 WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE publication_references SET reference_author = 'Jane Smith', reference_year = 2019 WHERE reference_id = 2;
UPDATE nanotech_publications SET publication_title='Advanced Nanotechnology Research', publication_year=2022, publication_keywords='nanotechnology, research' WHERE publication_id=101
UPDATE publication_authors SET author_affiliation='Nanotech Institute' WHERE author_id=301
UPDATE publications SET title = 'Updated Title 1' WHERE publication_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE researchers SET affiliation = 'New Affiliation' WHERE researcher_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE publications SET title = 'New Title', authors = ARRAY['Author A', 'Author B'], publication_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE publication_id = '1b9d6bcd-bbfd-4b2d-9b5d-ab8dfbbd4bed';
UPDATE researchers SET research_area = 'Machine Learning', name = 'John Doe', affiliation = 'University XYZ' WHERE researcher_id = '2c3324b8-6344-4b8a-8f78-3e9336fb715f';
